CWEs: CWE-77: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
description: The function unique_name_40 uses the execFile function to execute a ping command with user-supplied input (the 'ip' variable). This can lead to command injection if the user-supplied input is not properly sanitized. An attacker could provide an 'ip' that includes command line syntax, potentially allowing them to execute arbitrary commands on the system.
